attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ordinary working class people are finding it harder to survive in the UK. Higher taxes on essential goods and services are ensuring that more people are suffering. The lack of affordable housing, increased energy costs, council taxes, water rates, fuel costs are hitting hard working lower paid people disproportionately. This government should resign with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
